channel.title: Comments on: pup, Command Line HTML Processor

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/09/29/pup-command-line-html-processor/#comment-4252">julien51</a>.
Being able to subscribe to specific fragments is really nice.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to julien51.

Being able to subscribe to specific fragments is really nice.

item.title: By: julien51
item.dc:creator: julien51
item.description: I love jq and did not know about pupl. jq is one of the "triggers" that helped us release this http://blog.superfeedr.com/json-path/
item.content:encoded: I love jq and did not know about pupl. jq is one of the “triggers” that helped us release this http://blog.superfeedr.com/json-path/
